comment: A third of Hispanic immigrants are following the th century assimilation model and becoming Republicans. A third are sinking into America's hip hop underclass. The other third are so transient and disengaged from the country they're visiting that they're politically inert.
amr:
# ::snt A third of Hispanic immigrants are following the th century assimilation model and becoming Republicans. A third are sinking into America's hip hop underclass. The other third are so transient and disengaged from the country they're visiting that they're politically inert.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (f / follow-02
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                              :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (ii2 / immigrate-01)
                                    :mod (e / ethnic-group
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Hispanic")))
                              :ARG3 "3/4"))
                  :ARG1 (m2 / model
                        :mod (a2 / assimilate-01
                              :time (d / date-entity
                                    :century 20))))
            :op2 (b / become-01
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG2 (p3 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Republican"))))))
      :snt2 (s / sink-01
            :ARG1 (p5 / person
                  :ARG1-of (ii3 / include-91
                        :ARG2 (p6 / person
                              :ARG0-of (ii4 / immigrate-01))
                        :ARG3 "3/4"))
            :ARG4 (u / underclass
                  :mod (h2 / hip-hop)
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "America"))))
      :snt3 (h3 / have-degree-91
            :ARG1 (p7 / person
                  :ARG1-of (ii5 / include-91
                        :ARG2 p6
                        :ARG3 "3/4"))
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (t / transient)
                  :op2 (d2 / disengage-01
                        :ARG1 p7
                        :ARG2 (c2 / country
                              :ARG1-of (v / visit-01
                                    :ARG0 p7))))
            :ARG3 (s2 / so)
            :ARG6 (ii6 / inert
                  :mod (p8 / politics)
                  :domain p7)))

comment: Racist language and sentiments are not appropriate. Please moderate your language.
amr:
# ::snt Racist language and sentiments are not appropriate. Please moderate your language.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / appropriate-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (l / language
                        :mod (r / racist))
                  :op2 (s / sentiment)))
      :snt2 (m2 / moderate-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (l2 / language
                  :poss y)))

comment: Just because someone is a different race than you, doesn't mean they are less than you.
amr:
# ::snt Just because someone is a different race than you, doesn't mean they are less than you.
(m / mean-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (d / differ-02
            :ARG1 (s / someone)
            :ARG2 (y / you)
            :ARG3 (r / race))
      :ARG2 (l / less-than
            :op1 y
            :domain s)
      :mod (j / just))
